Key Match Events: Valdez retired the first three batters before walking Paul DeJong to start the second inning.
He struck out the side in the third and fourth innings.
In the fifth inning, Fermin grounded into a double play, allowing Valdez to escape.
Valdez struck out the side in the sixth inning.
In the seventh inning, he hit Salvador Perez with a pitch but then struck out DeJong and Fermin to end the inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros led 1-0 after a home run by Ben Gamel in the third inning.
Valdez's last no-hitter was on April 1, and there have been two other no-hitters this season.
